text: How to programmatically get SVN revision number?
Like this question, but without the need to actually query the SVN server.
This is a web-based project, so I figure I'll just use the repository as the public view (unless someone can advise me why this is a bad idea).
I assume this info is in a file in the .svn folder somewhere, but where, and how do I parse it?
I want to do something like what SO does, having the revision in the bottom-right corner.
Code in Python or PHP appreciated if you have it on hand, or just a point in the right direction.
